articles.title: Lichess4545 Stats
articles.description: Unofficial stats, records and other stuff
articles.contents:
Welcome to my unofficial Lichess4545 stats site!












Season stats and awards ⟶

Stats for every Lichess4545, LoneWolf and Lichess960 season

Award winners ⟶

Details on every player mentioned in a season report

All-time records ⟶

NEW: A collection of all-time records.

Match stories ⟶

Visualisations of Lichess4545 matches (S27 onwards)

Other stuff

Team logos | Players by continent/country

About the site ⟶









`


Current league statuses










Active - Season 43 is ongoing and will end on 17 Feb.






Active - Season 36 is ongoing and will end on 17 Feb.


Register




Currently off-season. Season 34 has ended, but registrations for the next season aren’t open yet.




Current community leagues situation, as of August 2024: Infinite Quest is going strong, Series (90+30) is about to start its 27th season, and Rapid Battle is on hiatus (last season ended in Oct 2023). Check out the Lichess4545 overview to learn more about these and other community leagues!


`{=html}




Last updated on

25 Mar 2025
